src_original: rdo rje slob dpon lus 'di la/_/rgyal ba'i sku ni rims bzhin bzhugs/_/dang po sku'i rdo rje ni/_/gzugs phung la ni yang dag bzhugs/_/rjes su chags
ni/_/'du shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs/_/mched pa kun gyi rdo rje ni/_/
'du byed kyi ni phung por bzhugs/_/bcom ldan thugs kyis rdo rje ni/_/rnam
shes phung por yang dag bzhugs/_/'di'i sha sogs sa khams la/_/bcom
ldan yum chen spyan ma bzhugs/_/dro ba la sogs me khams la/_/bcom ldan
yum chen gos dkar mo/_/skyod pa la sogs rlung khams la/_/bcom ldan yum

chen sgrol ma bzhugs/_/gsher ba la sogs chu khams la/_/bcom ldan rdo rje ma ma ki/_/de bzhin sku'i khams rnams la/_/bcom ldan rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// yul lnga rnam par dag pa las/_/mchod pa'i lha mo lnga ru gyur/_/de'i mig gi
dbang po gnyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i snying /_/de'i rna ba'i dbang gnyis la/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rdor bzhugs/_/de'i sna la bzhugs pa
ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam snying po/_/de'i lce la bzhugs pa ni/_/de
bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang /_/khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu ni/_/
'du shes bya bar rtags pa la/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba'i/_/de
de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang /_/lus kyi rtsha rgyus thams cad la/_/de
bzhin gshegs pa byams pa bzhugs/_/lag pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/_/
de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje gshed/_/lag pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/_/
de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan mi thub/_/kha'i pad+mar bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin
gshegs pa rta mgrin no/_/gsang ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin
gshegs pa bdud rtshi 'khyil/_/dpung pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin
gshegs pa mi g.yo ba/_/dpung pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal/_/pus mo g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin
gshegs pa stobs po che/_/rang gi spyi bor bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor los sgyur/_/rkang pa'i 'og tu bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa
